referenceObject.reference: Szűts, T., Zhang, J. X., Gallé-Szpisjak, N. & De Bakker, D. (2020). Jumping spiders (Araneae: Salticidae) of the Papua New Guinean Mount Wilhelm and surrounding mountains.
